Test data setup

{% raw %} 
import icedata
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
data_dir = icedata.fridge.load_data()
test_class_map = icedata.fridge.class_map()
parser = icedata.fridge.parser(data_dir, test_class_map)
test_train_records, test_valid_records = parser.parse()

draw_area_histogram[source]
draw_area_histogram(record_stats, class_label, class_map=None, bins=10, normalized=False, width=500, height=500)




Creates a histogram for a given class_label from record_stats.
